text: Versengold is a German folk and neo-medieval band formed in 2003. The originality of their music style is that they combine historical texts with modern folk elements. They have not recorded any cover songs. With seven albums released so far, they have become an integral part of the German folk scene. == Overview == == Members == File:Versengold Rockharz 2018 06.jpg|Singer Malte Hoyer File:Versengold Rockharz 2018 23.jpg|Violinist Alexander Willms File:Versengold Rockharz 2018 24.jpg|Violinist Florian Janoske File:Versengold Rockharz 2018 08.jpg|Guitarist Daniel Gregory File:Versengold Rockharz 2018 14.jpg|Drummer Sean Lang File:Versengold Rockharz 2018 03.jpg|Bassist Eike Otten == Discography == {| class="wikitable" |- ! rowspan="2"| Year ! rowspan="2"| Title ! colspan="4"| Peak chart positions |- !
